name: Ed Kami: Pro Runner Demo
description:
A Game about a Robot called Ed Kami Lost on a planet called Benope.
he needs to get as much money possible and Go for the Travelling machine on the edge, which it has a Refinery where money is used. 
Current Version: v1.0.0 (Demo)

Coming Soon: 
-Shop, where Ruby will be added and used for stuff like cosmetics. (this will come sooner than expected, because we are hungry of money, else it won't be added faster.)
-More levels, currently, demo won't be updated.
currently we've got 5 levels including tutorial.
more levels soon.




sorry for the bad graphics, i am a developer, not artist.                                                                 after we find a graphic artist who can decide where to put stuff, we will upgrade the game to V1.0.0.
